title: TikTok admits it banned former NBA player critical of China
description: The ban of Enes Kanter Freedom lasted 12 days, until TikTok's CEO was being grilled on Capitol Hill.

title: Blue Origin pinpoints reason for September rocket failure
description: Blue Origin hasn't flown since the failed launch, but says it will resume operations soon.

title: Musk says Twitter will get rid of blue checkmarks unless users pay up
description: Twitter tweeted on Friday that it will remove the small blue check marks, once used to denote notable accounts that had their identities verified, unless users pay $8 per month.

title: Americans deserve a better message than ‘Trust us, TikTok is bad.’
description: The risk of TikTok is real but mostly hypothetical. It's time for U.S. officials to make a detailed public pitch for why a ban is in our best interests.

title: For China, embattled TikTok chief is hero defying bullying U.S.
description: Chinese companies planning to invest in the United States are also expressing worry that they might face similar treatment as Shou Zi Chew.

title: Christopher Judge is blazing a new trail
description: The celebrated actor talks fatherhood, God of War and being outspoken as a Black leading man

title: America’s online privacy problems are much bigger than TikTok
description: A hearing about the privacy threats posed by TikTok's Chinese ownership obscured the reality that Americans have few online privacy rights to begin with.
